overview:
## Discussion

Calling this method stops a capture that was started manually in Xcode or programmatically by calling one of the methods on [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureManager].

When using a custom capture scope, calling this function preempts any [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureScope/end()] demarcations of the capture scope.

# stopCapture()

**Instance Method**

Stops capturing Metal commands.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopCapture()
```

## Discussion

Calling this method stops a capture that was started manually in Xcode or programmatically by calling one of the methods on [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureManager].

When using a custom capture scope, calling this function preempts any [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureScope/end()] demarcations of the capture scope.
title: stopCapture()
